org.nuiz.parallelRecommend
Class NormaliseData

java.lang.Object
  org.nuiz.parallelRecommend.NormaliseData

public class NormaliseData
extends java.lang.Object

An object to take datum and map between normalised and non-normalised form over all users.

Author:
Robert Newey

Constructor Detail

NormaliseData

public NormaliseData(DataList data,
                     double normFactor)
Given some DataList this computes transformations to give each user mean 0 and variance 1. Then normFactor pulls this towards the population mean for mean and variance. This is to regularise the transform somewhat. See Hoffman 2002 for details

Parameters:
data - Data to compute transforms on
normFactor - How much to pull user transforms towards the population mean.
Method Detail

normaliseUserRating

public double normaliseUserRating(int user,
                                  double rating)
Given a user and a denormalised rating, normalise the rating

Parameters:
user - Which user to do the transform for
rating - The rating to be normalise.
Returns:
The normalised rating

denormaliseUserRating

public double denormaliseUserRating(int user,
                                    double rating)
Given a user and a normalised rating, denormalise the rating

Parameters:
user - Which user to do the transform for
rating - The rating to be denormalise.
Returns:
The denormalised rating
